Package ui

Class MenuInputOptions

java.lang.Object
ui.MenuInput
ui.MenuInputOptions
public class MenuInputOptions extends MenuInput
Datastructure used by InputMenu for menu inputs where an option is desired.

Internally uses its own OptionMenuWithResult to store a list of String options and prompt the user to choose one.

Once the user chooses a valid option, the resulting chosen string is returned.

Author:
Isaac Fleetwood
See Also:
InputMenu
